subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Game 2 started as a pitchers’ duel between Michael Wacha and John Lackey, but the Red Sox threw away their one-run lead in the seventh to reopen the door for the Cardinals.
snippet: Game 2 started as a pitchers’ duel between Michael Wacha and John Lackey, but the Red Sox threw away their one-run lead in the seventh to reopen the door for the Cardinals.
